amendment.description: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study on casualty assistance and long-term care programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 3427 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Ernst to Amendment SA 3748. (consideration: CR S6312-6314) To require the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study on casualty assistance and long-term care programs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3427 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Ernst to Amendment SA 3748.
